title: Halloween Event
body: Last year (2014) and the year before (2013) had Halloween events starting on the 23rd of October. This year there is nothing, i would like to but a couple of the skins but there not here. What is going on?

replies.body: Same for me, I think because Worlds is on currently and they don't want to distract from it despite releasing the lore. I'm sure they will release a super extra awesome deal compensating us on our missed Harrowing.
I hope so i bought so RP for the event which now i can't use. {{item:3070}}
logged in just to upvote cause exact same thing happened to me

This is annoying, last two years they start the event 7-10 days before Halloween and the store is filled with skins. I hope they don't just release only those 3 skins because there are some others i want.

pretty sure riot said before something about them wanting to do things based on the harrowing and not halloween so there will still be room for releases and stuff after actual halloween because this time around is when the harrowing is
Come on riot, Why have the skins not been released yet? Did someone {{champion:222}}  the release or something D: {{item:3070}}

My guess is the skins will be released tomorrow, on the American Halloween, Americans often forget (or just straight up don't care) that we are a day ahead so we never get things on the appropriate days down under. 

As for the haloween event, there is the whole shadow isles lore change story.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=6jGZAhT1,discussion-id=qekM3nBw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-31T01:43:59.532+0000)
>
> My guess is the skins will be released tomorrow, on the American Halloween, Americans often forget (or just straight up don't care) that we are a day ahead so we never get things on the appropriate days down under. 
> 
> As for the haloween event, there is the whole shadow isles lore change story.

still havent been released
Yeah, good story acctualy downloaded it. Still want skins D:
Still waiting for the new Jinx skin so I can buy it.....
